result.purpose: Configuration management for the application, defining various settings and parameters.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, organizing configuration management and utility functions into separate files for clarity and maintainability.

config/config.go.purpose: Configuration management for the application, defining various settings and parameters.

config/config.yml.purpose: Configuration file for mobile wallet manager service settings.

config/func_print.go.purpose: This file contains functions for hiding sensitive data in configurations.

config/func_print_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for hiding sensitive data in maps and slices.
